thread.title: Director of GVSU water institute receives national award for work
thread.title_full: Director of GVSU water institute receives national award for work

author: Stephen Kloosterman | sklooste@mlive.com
title: Director of GVSU water institute receives national award for work

organizations.name: grand valley state university's annis water resources institut

text: Muskegon's Alan Steinman, director of Grand Valley State University's Annis Water Resources Institute, received a national award for his work to advance environmental responsibility.
